data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Pljevlja to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Pljevlja, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: There are 26,600 people living in the state of Pljevlja. Only about 70 might be believers.
Father, we ask for 5 new simple churches in the state of Pljevlja, Montenegro. Place a simple church in every community of the 26,600 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Pljevlja.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turk people.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Pljevlja, Montenegro a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Pljevlja, Montenegro a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.section_summary:
the state of Pljevlja, Montenegro has a population of 26,600.

We estimate Pljevlja has 70 people who might know Jesus, 19,683 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,847 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 379 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Pljevlja. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
